feed.title: Voyager Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Voyager: 2.17.0
entry.content:
New Features

Subscribed icon (beta-ish!)

You can now enable a little heart badge next to a community to easily tell if you are subscribed or not. You can also select whether to enable only in all/local (where you probably have most interest in seeing it), or everywhere.

By default it is turned off: In some situations, it may be clipped/ellipsed (if the name is too long). I plan on fixing this layout issue in the future.

Filtered websites

You can now filter posts in your feed to specific websites! Keep in mind this does NOT sync with your lemmy account like blocks do.

Persisted search sort

The search feeds, and discover communities feed will now remember your sort (if "Remember Community Sort" is on in Settings).

What's Changed

  • Fix private message feed showing sent messages when switching accounts by @aeharding in https://github.com/aeharding/voyager/pull/1574
  • Add subscribed icon by @aeharding in https://github.com/aeharding/voyager/pull/1573
  • Fix subscribed icon showing in mod feed by @aeharding in https://github.com/aeharding/voyager/pull/1575
  • Improve support for testing (http, custom ports, env variables) by @aeharding in https://github.com/aeharding/voyager/pull/1577
  • Add filtered websites by @aeharding in https://github.com/aeharding/voyager/pull/1578
  • Add .editorconfig by @aashu16 in https://github.com/aeharding/voyager/pull/1579
  • Add persisted search sort by @aeharding in https://github.com/aeharding/voyager/pull/1580
  • Move subscribed icon setting to Appearance, increase icons size by @aeharding in https://github.com/aeharding/voyager/pull/1582
  • (chore) Update README instances list by @aeharding in https://github.com/aeharding/voyager/pull/1583
  • Hide subscribed icon on community results feed, use primary color by @aeharding in https://github.com/aeharding/voyager/pull/1584
  • Fix error message on lemm.ee image upload by @aeharding in https://github.com/aeharding/voyager/pull/1586

Full Changelog: https://github.com/aeharding/voyager/compare/2.16.0...2.17.0

entry.title: New release for Voyager: 2.17.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Update e2e action to use a better testing setup by @aashu16 in https://github.com/aeharding/voyager/pull/1585
  • Fix large numbered lists cut off in spoiler tags by @aeharding in https://github.com/aeharding/voyager/pull/1591
  • Override lemmy server URL when 'VITE__TEST_MODE' is set by @aashu16 in https://github.com/aeharding/voyager/pull/1593
  • Fix flakey inbox count update on marking item(s) read by @aeharding in https://github.com/aeharding/voyager/pull/1596
  • Fix invalid link preview by @aeharding in https://github.com/aeharding/voyager/pull/1599

Full Changelog: https://github.com/aeharding/voyager/compare/2.17.0...2.17.1

entry.title: New release for Voyager: 2.18.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add vegantheoryclub.org, remove feddit.de by @aeharding in https://github.com/aeharding/voyager/pull/1610
  • Upgrade deps, add lemmy v0.20.0 support by @aeharding in https://github.com/aeharding/voyager/pull/1611
  • Add dark & tinted icon variants for default app icon by @fer0n in https://github.com/aeharding/voyager/pull/1607
  • Add vegantheoryclub.org to signup niche category by @aeharding in https://github.com/aeharding/voyager/pull/1612
  • Fix: Remove block button when long-pressing your own handle by @sharunkumar in https://github.com/aeharding/voyager/pull/1594
  • (chore) Bump appflow build version by @aeharding in https://github.com/aeharding/voyager/pull/1614

Full Changelog: https://github.com/aeharding/voyager/compare/2.17.1...2.18.0
